ezrpg
=====

.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/ezrpg/badge/?version=latest
    :target: https://ezrpg.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest
    :alt: Documentation Status

.. image:: https://badge.fury.io/py/ezrpg.svg
    :target: https://badge.fury.io/py/ezrpg

.. image:: https://github.com/moshez/ezrpg/actions/workflows/pr-main.yml/badge.svg
    :target: https://github.com/moshez/ezrpg/actions


Make it slightly easier to run
Role Playing Games
with Python.

Background
----------

No matter what your favorite Python
interactive console is,
`ezrpg`
is designed to help you run your campaign.
